A restart/some updates

Apr 2, 2024

I used to post relatively frequently on this blog as an undergraduate, and essentially stopped once I started grad school. It seems fun to try to restart it (and post with far less frequency than I used to). (I have archived the old posts; if, for some reason, you want to see them, let me know.) I will soon add to this post a discussion about a recent article that I finished. It is concerned with a few different, but related, topics, and I would like to illustrate some of the pretty linear algebra and geometry surrounding them.
